mapper.insert:
select seq_diag_id.nextval from dual
insert into UO_DIAG_LIST(DIAG_ID, DIAG_NAME, PERIOD_TYPE, BEGIN_DT, END_DT, CREATE_DT, KPI_CODE, DIM_DISPLAY_NAME, CREATE_BY) values(#{diagId}, #{diagName}, #{periodType}, #{beginDt}, #{endDt}, #{createDt}, #{kpiCode}, #{dimDisplayName}, #{createBy})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT d.DIAG_ID, d.DIAG_NAME, d.DIM_DISPLAY_NAME, k.KPI_NAME, d.BEGIN_DT, d.END_DT, d.PERIOD_TYPE FROM UO_DIAG_LIST d LEFT JOIN UO_KPI_LIST_CONFIG k ON d.KPI_CODE = k.KPI_CODE ) t WHERE t.DIAG_ID = #{diagId}
